usage: Used for strength training, resistance exercises, and fitness workouts at home, in gyms, or in fitness classes.
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training
Ideal for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
Cast iron construction with neoprene coating for durability
Printed weight number on each end cap
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
NON TOXIC (as indicated by seal graphic)
ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth, anti-slip coated finish. Each end cap is printed in white with the KAKSS logo and “1 KG” for easy weight ID. The solid, coated metal design sits flat on surfaces, preventing rolling and adding a clean, modern look.
target_audience: Home exercisers, fitness enthusiasts, and beginners looking for light hand weights for workouts or fitness classes.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training - Pink
